filmography.title: Pigskin Parade
filmography.role_description: A hillbilly girl with a powerful singing voice who gets recruited along with her brother to play for a college football team.
filmography.plot: A college football coach recruits a hillbilly melon grower who can throw a melon 60 yards, but he brings his singing sister along.

filmography.title: Broadway Melody of 1938
filmography.role_description: A talented young singer who famously serenades a photograph of Clark Gable with the song 'Dear Mr. Gable: You Made Me Love You'.
filmography.plot: A young producer tries to stage a Broadway show despite financial troubles, featuring a young girl with a crush on a movie star.

filmography.title: Love Finds Andy Hardy
filmography.role_description: The girl next door who secretly pines for Andy Hardy and helps him out of a jam with her singing talent.
filmography.plot: Andy Hardy is caught between three girls while trying to buy a car, but his neighbor Betsy helps him out.

filmography.title: The Wizard of Oz
filmography.role_description: A Kansas farm girl who is swept away by a tornado to a magical land and embarks on a journey to find her way home.
filmography.plot: Dorothy Gale is swept away from a farm in Kansas to a magical land of Oz in a tornado and embarks on a quest with her new friends to see the Wizard who can help her return home.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Juvenile Award; National Film Registry (Inducted 1989)

filmography.title: Babes in Arms
filmography.role_description: A vaudevillian's daughter who teams up with Mickey Moran to put on a show and prove their parents wrong.
filmography.plot: A group of young entertainers try to put on a show to prove to their vaudevillian parents that they can make it on their own.

filmography.title: Strike Up the Band
filmography.role_description: A high school student and singer who helps her friend turn a school orchestra into a swing band.
filmography.plot: A high school drummer and his singer girlfriend try to convert the school orchestra into a swing band to enter a radio contest.

filmography.title: Little Nellie Kelly
filmography.role_description: A dual role playing both an Irish mother who dies in childbirth and her spirited daughter who grows up in New York.
filmography.plot: The daughter of an Irish policeman marries against her father's wishes and moves to America, but tragedy strikes.

filmography.title: Ziegfeld Girl
filmography.role_description: A vaudeville performer who gets her big break in the Ziegfeld Follies but struggles to leave her father behind.
filmography.plot: Three women from different backgrounds are hired to be Ziegfeld Girls, and the job changes their lives in different ways.

filmography.title: Life Begins for Andy Hardy
filmography.role_description: The loyal friend who helps Andy Hardy navigate the challenges of living on his own in New York City.
filmography.plot: Andy Hardy decides to forgo college for a while to try his hand at working in the big city, with Betsy Booth along to help.

filmography.title: Babes on Broadway
filmography.role_description: An aspiring singer who joins forces with a talented young producer to put on a settlement house benefit show.
filmography.plot: A group of young hopefuls try to stage a show on Broadway to help underprivileged children.

filmography.title: For Me and My Gal
filmography.role_description: A vaudeville singer who dreams of playing the Palace with her ambitious partner, set against the backdrop of World War I.
filmography.plot: Two vaudeville performers fall in love and dream of playing the Palace, but World War I interrupts their plans.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Top Ten Films

filmography.title: Presenting Lily Mars
filmography.role_description: A small-town girl with big dreams who pesters a Broadway producer until he gives her a chance.
filmography.plot: A stagestruck small-town girl tries to convince a visiting producer to give her a part in his new play.

filmography.title: Girl Crazy
filmography.role_description: The postmistress of a small Western town who captures the heart of a playboy sent there to straighten out.
filmography.plot: A rich playboy is sent to a small college in the West, where he falls for the local postmistress and helps save the school.

filmography.title: Meet Me in St. Louis
filmography.role_description: A young woman in 1904 St. Louis who deals with love, family, and the impending World's Fair.
filmography.plot: In the year leading up to the 1904 St. Louis World's Fair, the four Smith daughters learn lessons of life and love.

filmography.title: The Clock
filmography.role_description: A New York office worker who meets a soldier on a 48-hour leave and falls in love with him during a whirlwind romance.
filmography.plot: A soldier on a two-day leave in New York City meets a girl and they fall in love and get married before he has to leave.

filmography.title: The Harvey Girls
filmography.role_description: A mail-order bride who leaves her prospective husband to become a waitress for the Harvey House restaurant chain in the Wild West.
filmography.plot: A group of waitresses for the Fred Harvey Company travel west to open a restaurant and bring civilization to a rowdy town.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Original Song ('On the Atchison, Topeka and the Santa Fe')

filmography.title: Till the Clouds Roll By
filmography.role_description: She portrays the real-life Broadway star Marilyn Miller in this biopic of composer Jerome Kern.
filmography.plot: A musical biography of the life and career of composer Jerome Kern, featuring an all-star cast performing his songs.

filmography.title: The Pirate
filmography.role_description: A lonely woman in the Caribbean who dreams of the legendary pirate Macoco and is courted by an actor posing as him.
filmography.plot: A girl is engaged to the local mayor but dreams of a legendary pirate; a traveling actor decides to pose as the pirate to win her heart.

filmography.title: Easter Parade
filmography.role_description: A naive chorus girl hired by a dancer to replace his former partner, eventually becoming a star in her own right.
filmography.plot: A nightclub performer hires a naive chorus girl to become his new partner to make his former partner jealous, but he falls in love with her.

filmography.title: In the Good Old Summertime
filmography.role_description: A salesgirl in a music shop who unknowingly corresponds with her bickering co-worker through anonymous love letters.
filmography.plot: Two employees at a music store constantly quarrel, unaware that they are secret pen pals who have fallen in love.
filmography.awards: Musical Remake of 'The Shop Around the Corner'

filmography.title: Summer Stock
filmography.role_description: A farm owner who reluctantly allows a theatre troupe to rehearse in her barn, featuring the iconic 'Get Happy' number.
filmography.plot: A struggling theatre company takes over a rural farm to rehearse their new show, disrupting the life of the farm's owner.

filmography.title: A Star Is Born
filmography.role_description: An aspiring singer who achieves Hollywood stardom while her actor husband's career and life spiral downward into alcoholism.
filmography.plot: A movie star helps a young singer and actress find fame, even as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Actress; Golden Globe: Win – Best Actress (Comedy/Musical)

filmography.title: Judgment at Nuremberg
filmography.role_description: A German housewife who gives emotional testimony during the war crimes trials about her relationship with an elderly Jewish man.
filmography.plot: In 1948, an American court in occupied Germany tries four Nazi judges for war crimes.

filmography.title: A Child Is Waiting
filmography.role_description: A new teacher at a school for intellectually disabled children who clashes with the head psychologist over her attachment to a student.
filmography.plot: A new teacher at a state institution for children with developmental disabilities challenges the head doctor's strict methods.

filmography.title: I Could Go On Singing
filmography.role_description: A famous American singer touring London who tries to reconnect with her estranged son and former lover in her final film role.
filmography.plot: A famous singer travels to London to perform and attempts to win back the affections of her illegitimate son.
